definition.text: This node stores a reference to the Social Trading Bot being used by its parent Trading Bot Instance to send or receive Trading Signals on the Superalgos peer to peer network.

paragraphs.text: If a user is sending trading signals, the social trading bot that will be referenced should be set up under the user's profile.
If the user is receiving signals, then the social trading bot to be referenced will be found under the signal providers user profile.
